page.description: This warning is shown when a UX contains one or more Lists that are inside a container that has no height and the List is configured to fill the container.

discussion.p: List, ViewBoxes, FormViews, and other controls can be configured to fill the control's parent container. If the container does not have a height, the control may not scroll properly. If Alpha Anywhere detects that a List with fill container enabled has been placed inside a container with no height, a warning message is shown:

description.p: To resolve the warning, specify the [Height] property for all containers listed in the warning message.
